channel.title: Java help..?
channel.description:
When i run any server/client it is saying "Java is not recognised as an internal or external command, or operaral batch file"
Something around those lines, there is one client that will run, but i copy'd the code from its run.bat and pasted on my client files but still wont run?
Any suggestions appreciated :)
Thanks, Jake.

item.title: Java help..?
item.dc:creator: @RedFalconBlue RedFalconBlue
item.description:
@RedFalconBlue wrote:

You need to set your environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Java help..?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Download and install JDK.
To find it just google:
Java Development kit 7.03
Hope I helped. If you have anymore errors message me

Read full topic
